body:
- [x] Removed obsolete version 1.6.9.
- [x] Updated urls (from zmaw.de to mpimet.mpg.de).
- [x] Added new version 1.9.0.
- [x] Removed per version specification of urls.
- [x] Converted from Package to AutotoolsPackage.
- [x] New variant 'openmp'.
- [x] Variants 'curl' and 'magics' set to False by default (not needed for most installations).
title: Updates for package 'cdo'.
